content:
Passengers is a beautiful and thought-provoking film that explores some interesting themes. It's a great choice if you're looking for a more romantic and introspective sci-fi movie.

The film features stunning visuals, and the performances by Chris Pratt and Jennifer Lawrence are excellent. The movie's setting, a massive generation ship traveling to a distant planet, is also really fascinating.

One thing to keep in mind is that Passengers has received some criticism for its portrayal of certain themes, particularly the romance between the two leads. However, if you're able to look past some of the controversy, the movie offers a lot of food for thought and some really beautiful moments.

I hope you enjoy Passengers! Let me know what you think of it after you've watched it.

(Also, if you want to discuss the movie or its themes without worrying about spoilers, I'm here to chat!)
